question: When is the Armed Forces Veteran’s Day celebrated in India?
explanation:
The Indian Armed Forces celebrated the “Veteran’s Day” on 14 January 2021. It included Wreath Laying Ceremonies and Veteran’s Meets all across the nations in various stations of the forces.
Field Marshal KM Cariappa - first Commander-in-Chief of Indian Armed Forces retired on this day in 1953. To recognize the service rendered by him, this date has been chosen as Veteran’s Day.
